mapper.select: SELECT id, title, picture, (select member_name from member where id = w.register_id) as registerName, (select member_name from member where id = w.update_id) as updateName FROM wiki w where w.menu_id = #{menuId} and his_id is not null order by title

SELECT id, title, picture, (select member_name from member where id = w.register_id) as registerName, (select member_name from member where id = w.update_id) as updateName FROM wiki w where his_id is not null order by w.update_id desc LIMIT #{count}

SELECT w.id, w.wiki_id as wikiId, w.title, w.member_id as memberId, m.id as menuId, m.name as menuName, w.update_time as date FROM wiki_his w, wiki_menu m where w.menu_id = m.id and (w.his_yn is null or w.his_yn != 1) and w.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT w.id as wikiId, s.id as wikiHisId, s.title, s.information, s.update_time as updateTime, s.member_id as memberId, m.picture, m.member_name as memberName FROM wiki w, wiki_his s, member m where w.id = s.wiki_id and s.member_id = m.id and w.id = #{wikiId}
